text: BASIC T/O — WRITES If TS(T;) < R-TS(X) or TS(T;) < W-TS(X) —> Abort and restart T;. Else: — Allow T; to write X and update W-TS(X) — Also have to make a local copy of X to ensure repeatable reads for T;. l l E 1:58/1:20:37 - BASIC T/O - WRITES > m S G \|>:| Ly CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
